objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGrad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#8A2BE2'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#9932CC'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='bgGrad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#87CEEB'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#32CD32'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGrad2)'/><path d='M0 0 L1080 0 L0 1080 Z' fill='url(#bgGrad1)'/><g fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.15'><circle cx='120' cy='220' r='15'/><circle cx='180' cy='320' r='25'/><circle cx='90' cy='420' r='20'/><circle cx='250' cy='150' r='30'/><circle cx='320' cy='380' r='18'/><circle cx='180' cy='480' r='22'/><circle cx='400' cy='220' r='28'/><circle cx='480' cy='380' r='15'/><circle cx='760' cy='820' r='25'/><circle cx='680' cy='920' r='30'/><circle cx='800' cy='760' r='20'/><circle cx='880' cy='850' r='18'/><circle cx='920' cy='700' r='22'/><circle cx='830' cy='950' r='28'/><circle cx='700' cy='780' r='15'/></g><g transform='rotate(-15 540 540)'><rect x='0' y='540' width='1080' height='3' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.3'/><rect x='0' y='560' width='1080' height='2' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.2'/><rect x='0' y='520' width='1080' height='1' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.1'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
✓ Premium Non-Toxic Formula
✓ Biggest & Brightest Bubbles
✓ Eco-Friendly & Safe for Kids
✓ Hours of Colorful Fun

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
This colorful promotional banner highlights a bubble solution product using a dynamic diagonal split background. The top left triangle features a vivid purple gradient, while the bottom right is filled with a vibrant green gradient. The composition includes an eye-catching title ("heading") in bold white, followed by a playful "subheading" text in bright golden yellow. Below, there's a high-contrast benefits list ("description") in white with checkmarks. The "tagline" emphasizes product size, and the "price" pops in large, striking yellow font for instant visibility. The "cta_button" is a rounded green rectangle with a white call-to-action text ("cta"). A large "product_image" bottle appears tilted on the right side, dominating the green section for product focus. Decorative vector bubbles add a fun, lively atmosphere throughout the background.

**Color Palette:**
- Purple: #8A2BE2
- Light Purple: #9932CC
- Green: #32CD32
- Sky Blue: #87CEEB
- Yellow: #FFD700
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image for Gazillion Bubbles features a vibrant and playful color palette ideal for creating a cheerful and energetic advertisement banner. Dominant colors include neon green from the liquid (HEX #6EF58C), bright yellow for the word "BUBBLES" (HEX #FFD600), and a rich purple cap and label base (HEX #7F3FBF). The brand logo blends lime green (HEX #C4EF36), dark blue (HEX #2E3192), and orange accents (HEX #FF6A00) for contrast and depth. Pastel blues and pinks in the bubble graphics (HEX #BDDFF6, HEX #F4CFFB) add a whimsical touch. The colors are layered and outlined strategically to make elements pop while maintaining harmony.
